text: Kemana kaâ€™re musarikadera jan'ya allahâ€Œra sange o tamra rasulera sange cukti hate pare, tadera samparke chara yadera sange tomara cukti karechile pabitra masajidera nikate? Sutaram yataksana tara tomadera prati kayema thakabe tataksana tomara'o tadera prati kayema ra'ibe. Nihsandeha allah dharmaparayanadera bhalobasena.
